## DiffOpArr type

A patch operation that applies a list of array mutations (`ops`<!-- -->) at `path`<!-- -->.

- The `ops` list can include insert (`ins`<!-- -->), delete (`del`<!-- -->), and set (`set`<!-- -->) operations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type DiffOpArr = {
    kind: 'arr';
    path: DiffPath;
    ops: (DiffArrIns | DiffArrDel | DiffArrSet)[];
};
```
**References:** [DiffPath](doc/markdown/./base.diffpath.md)<!-- -->, [DiffArrIns](doc/markdown/./base.diffarrins.md)<!-- -->, [DiffArrDel](doc/markdown/./base.diffarrdel.md)<!-- -->, [DiffArrSet](doc/markdown/./base.diffarrset.md)
